plot: In the thirty-fourth annual Simpsons Halloween special, Bart is turned into an NFT, Lisa turns to Sideshow Bob for help in tracking down a serial killer and an outbreak turns Springfielders into Homers.

In the first part, Marge takes a NFT attack against the cartoon characters trap set by Mr. Teeny in a parody of Black Mirror Bandersnatch Meanwhile, the second part is a parody of The Silence of the Lambs with Sideshow Bob as main villain, and in final part, the citizens of Springfield was mutated into Homers, thanks to his radioactive exposure. Marge and the kids must find a way to cure the situation before everything turns worse in a parody of George A. Romero's "The Crazies."

In the 34th Treehouse of Horror, Marge has to battle NFT's to find her son, we see an alternate universe where Sideshow Bob managed to kill Bart, resulting in a Lisa from the future having to use him to track down another serial killer in a Silence of the Lambs parody, and the citizens of Springfield being turned into Homer.—Dylan H.
